last_episode_to_air.name: Old McDonald Had a Ghost - EE II EEYOW
last_episode_to_air.overview: Goober and the kids check out a report from George McDonald of a haunted farm that is haunted by the Ghost of Old McDonald and a living scarecrow.

name: Goober and the Ghost Chasers
overview: A dog, able to become temporarily invisible, and his human companions investigate mysteries involving the paranormal.

episodes.name: Assignment: The Ahaab Aparition
episodes.overview: The Partridge kids are vacationing at Peaceful Cover, but it's anything but peaceful! The ghost of Captain Ahab and Moby Dick are haunting the old mansion on the cliff and it's up to Goober and the kids to interview them for their magazine

episodes.name: Brush Up Your Shakespeare
episodes.overview: The and Goober and the gang are aboard an old pirate ship, for publicity pictures when the ship is set adrift by the salty spirits

episodes.name: The Galloping Ghost
episodes.overview: The Partridge Kids Goober and the gang decide to spend their vacation in Kahrobi land of the arabian nights and ghosts!

episodes.name: The Singing Ghost
episodes.overview: Frankenstein's Monster the Third tricks Danny and The Partridge Kids into coming to his castle to discuss a singing engagement.

episodes.name: The Ghost Ship
episodes.overview: Goober and the gang are aboard an old pirate ship called the Sea Witch for publicity pictures. The Sea Witch is soon set adrift by the salty spirits led by Captain Dunk. They also encounter Dunk's nicer twin brother Dink.

episodes.name: Mummy Knows Best
episodes.overview: The Partridge kids are supposed to play a concert but their performance is cancelled when Macbeth's ghost begins haunting the hall.

episodes.name: The Haunted Wax Museum
episodes.overview: With a day off between concerts The Partridge kids decide to visit an old wax museum a hangout for ghosts.

episodes.name: Aloha Ghost
episodes.overview: Goober and the gang travel to Hawaii to do a story on a reported ghost sighting on a plantation where Michael Gray works on.

episodes.name: The Wicked Witch Dog
episodes.overview: At an amusement park the haunted house is a little too haunted for The Partridge Kids, Goober and the gang

episodes.name: Venice Anyone?
episodes.overview: A supernatural canine is haunting the lighthouse of MacBurn's Point in Scotland

episodes.name: Go West Young Ghost, Go West
episodes.overview: At an amusement park, the haunted house is a little too haunted for The Partridge Kids, Goober and the gang when they find it haunted by the Ghost of Ichabod Ipswich.

episodes.name: Is Sherlock Holme?
episodes.overview: Frankenstein's Monster the 3rd tricks Danny and The Partridge Kids into coming to his castle to discuss a singing engagement. Once there, they realize the only thing he wants is Danny's voice for his own!

episodes.name: That Snow Ghost
episodes.overview: Goober and the gang are hired by a ski resort to investigate a reported Snow Ghost.

episodes.name: Old McDonald Had a Ghost - EE II EEYOW
episodes.overview: Goober and the kids check out a report from George McDonald of a haunted farm that is haunted by the Ghost of Old McDonald and a living scarecrow.
